text: @charliekirk11 So what you’re saying is, at least when things got serious, he took it seriously? Cause we’re at 770,564 cases of covid-19 rn with 41,114, and the orange has done fuck all. That’s why people are outraged. The orange is actively making things worse each second. Gtfoutta here
